Package com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator

Class Foxes

java.lang.Object
com.toropov.oleg.entity.Entity
com.toropov.oleg.entity.Creature
com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator.Predator
com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator.Foxes
Direct Known Subclasses:
FemaleFox, FoxCub, MaleFox
public abstract class Foxes extends Predator
Represents a fox in the simulation. Foxes can hunt herbivores or find a mate to reproduce.

      public Foxes(Coordinates coordinates, int speed, int healthPoints, int generation)
      Constructs a new Fox.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the initial coordinates of the fox
      speed - the speed of the fox
      healthPoints - the health points of the fox
      generation - the generation of the fox

  • Method Details

    • areEntitiesExceedingThreshold

      protected boolean areEntitiesExceedingThreshold(Map<EntityType,Integer> countEntities)
      Checks if the fox population exceeds the predefined threshold.
      Parameters:
      countEntities - the map of entity counts
      Returns:
      true if the fox population exceeds the threshold, false otherwise

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(WorldMap map)
      Makes a move for the fox in the world map. The fox can regenerate health, hunt herbivores, or find a mate.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in class Creature
      Parameters:
      map - the world map

    • checkForCreateFoxCub

      protected void checkForCreateFoxCub(WorldMap map, Coordinates nextMove)
      Checks if a fox cub can be created at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      map - the world map
      nextMove - the coordinates of the next move
